title: Chattering Teeth Bomb
summaries: The Chattering Teeth Bomb is an enemy. It hops about, similarly to the Herpling, making small jumps and then large jumps as it makes its way toward the player to explode. On the [img:Desktop version] Desktop version, [img:Console version] Console version, and [img:Mobile version] Mobile version, it is spawned by Clowns during Hardmode Blood Moons. It is unspawnable on the [img:Legacy tModLoader version] Legacy tModLoader version.

statistics.Damage: 120/240/360
statistics.Max Life: 200/400/600
statistics.KB Resist: 50%/55%/60%
